rows.label: tev055201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev055201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Tora about the Nopon caravans.

rows.label: tev055201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev055201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Tora if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev055201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Tora about business negotiations with the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev055201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Tora what he did during the attack.

rows.label: tev055201_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Tora about the battle with the Zu Pharg.

rows.label: tev055201_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Tora if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev055201_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Tora about the final battle in the Lifehold Core.

rows.label: tev055201_SEL0111
rows.name:
Ask Tora when the battle for
Nopon supremacy will be settled.

rows.label: tev055201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Tora about recent developments.

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Dodonga Caravan admittedly mildly famous.
That former caravan of Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0002
rows.name:
But Dodonga Caravan cannot hold candle to old
caravan of Tora—super amazing wonderful Dorian
Caravan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0003
rows.name:
If friend goes east from Oblivia canyon entrance,
friend will hit steep trench called Ibra Ravine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Head north from there to find super Dorian Caravan.
Caravan surrounded by ginormous lake, if that help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Friend should go check it out, see for self how wild
Nopon nomads tame savage frontier![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Noctilum, home of Dodonga Caravan, is to west.
Oblivia, handsome home of Tora, is to east.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0011
rows.name:
And far far FAAAR to north lies terrible, horrifying,
unspeakable—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Mrrm... Friend probably wants to see terrible horrors
for self. Friend should have same joy of exploring and
discovering Mira that Nopon have![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0013
rows.name:
It is very big world out there. But no matter how far
away something might seem, so long as friend feels
like going there, friend can get there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0014
rows.name:
So what is human friend waiting for? Go, go!
Use silly long legs to dash across landscape and
uncover every corner![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Tora hoping to score points with Nopon Commerce
Guild by landing whopper of contract with Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0020
rows.name:
But for smart aliens, Ma-non are kind of dumb.
They know NOTHING about business or money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Negotiations not going so well. Big plan of Tora
coming apart at seams. And then who come along?
Tatsu! Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0022
rows.name:
Tatsu walk to Ma-non and mention name of friend.
He say, "[ST:playername ] save you, right?"
Then he break out extra-large pizza and contract.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0023
rows.name:
Now EVERYONE love Tatsu! How did he know so
many people? How did he learn so much about other
cultures? Unfair! Meh-meh-meeeeh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0024
rows.name:
Well, Tora know when Tora is defeated...for now.
But one day, it will be Tora waving greasy signed
contract in face of Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Tora not want stupid Tatsu claiming all bits of glory,
so Tora decided to pull some favors and scrape
together supplies for city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Together with friends at home in Dorian Caravan,
Tora load up whole herd of nopopotamuses with
shipments of miranium![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0031
rows.name:
Then Tora and caravan SMASH right through Ganglion
soldiers to reach city! ...Tora nearly wet self from fear.
Tora not ashamed to admit that to friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0032
rows.name:
It is good that friend won. Otherwise, harrowing
experience of Tora would have been for nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0033
rows.name:
Good job, human friend! Keep punching Ganglion in
big stupid faces![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0038
rows.name:
Tatsu say he take down that behemoth all by himself,
but Tora not impressed at all! Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0039
rows.name:
Mighty Tora actually took down Ruler of Fates that lurks
deep in Noctilum. Took him down with one paw tied
behind back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0040
rows.name:
Don't stare at Tora like that! Story is completely true!
Tora use Mega Torageddon move to put hurt on nasty
Ruler of Fates![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0041
rows.name:
...What? F-friend wants to know what Ruler look like?
Er, Tora cannot answer because Tora was blinded
by battle rage. Saw only red.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0046
rows.name:
Soon, Tora will be reunited with mamapon and
dadapon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0047
rows.name:
But it very important that Tora become distinguished
merchant before reunion happens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0048
rows.name:
Tora might have to hire BLADE friend to get ball
rolling, otherwise stingy Nopon Commerce Guild never
give Tora membership.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0049
rows.name:
But friend looks kind of busy. ...Also expensive.
Does friend know any novice BLADEs who do good
work for cheap? Maybe even free?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0054
rows.name:
There bound to be epic scrap, meh...
What if something happen to Tatsu...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0055
rows.name:
Say... Would friend do Tora huge favor?
Please bring Tatsu here before friends head out
for grand showdown, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0060
rows.name:
Tora hears that Ganglion is making all kinds of nasty
preparations. Plan to stop friends dead in tracks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0061
rows.name:
Tatsu has to promise to be careful.
Tora not want Tatsu to die![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0062
rows.name: This fight for human friends. Fight they will win![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0063
rows.name:
But Tora still needs to finish battle with Tatsu for
Nopon supremacy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0064
rows.name:
Tora cannot prove who better Nopon is if Tatsu comes
back in little body bag, so be safe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0069
rows.name:
Did Tatsu survive Lifehold Core death trap?
Is Tatsu safe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0070
rows.name:
Meh! Good! This means Tora can challenge Tatsu to
final face-off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0071
rows.name:
Go ahead! Bring Tatsu! Tora will not run.
Tora will prove supremacy once and for all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0076
rows.name: Meh! Right now! Why wait?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0077
rows.name:
Tora very glad Tatsu return from Lifehold Core death
trap, but now Tatsu must face music for real.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0078
rows.name:
Today Tora and Tatsu decide once and for all who
is greatest Nopon! Dun dun DUNNNH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0079
rows.name:
...Meh? Tatsu too hungry to have final face-off
right now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0080
rows.name:
No fair! Does stupid Tatsu know how hard Tora has
been practicing?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG0081
rows.name:
Tora bother all kinds of human friends to practice
rock paper scissors and duck duck goose.
Did Tora train to become true warrior for nothing?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG1001
rows.name:
Now that Tora member of Nopon Commerce Guild,
wares of Tora selling like hotcakes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG1002
rows.name:
Tora going to do just like Dadato said and treat
good friends like [ST:playername ] and Mia
EXTRA special![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG1003
rows.name:
Friends get first dibs on leftover and defective...
*ahem* Er, BEST merchandise![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG1004
rows.name:
Friends not regret single purchase ever.
That what friends are for![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG2001
rows.name: Has friend been to Dodonga Caravan yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev055201_MSG2002
rows.name:
Make sure to bring back nice present for Tora, okay?
After all, Tora was nice enough to tell about amazing,
best-ever caravan in first place.[ST:wait ]
